Sends the chat history to the client starting from a specified index.
sendMessage(INotifyValidationChanged, String, String) - Method in class Controller.ChatController

Sends a message to the server and notifies subscribers about the result.
Server - Class in Unnamed Package
The Server class represents a chat server that accepts incoming client connections.
Server() - Constructor for class Server
Constructs a Server object and initializes the server socket.
setAddress(String) - Method in class Models.SettingsModel
Sets the server address and notifies subscribers about the change.
setPort(int) - Method in class Models.SettingsModel
Sets the port number and notifies subscribers about the change.
SettingsController - Class in Controller
The SettingsController class manages user settings and provides validation functionality for address and port changes.
SettingsController(SettingsModel) - Constructor for class Controller.SettingsController
Constructs a new SettingsController instance with the specified SettingsModel.
SettingsModel - Class in Models
The SettingsModel class provides functionality for managing application settings.
SettingsModel() - Constructor for class Models.SettingsModel
Constructs a new instance of SettingsModel with default address "localhost" and port 1337.
SettingsTabPageView - Class in Views.TabPages
The SettingsTabPageView class provides a tab page for managing application settings in the main window.

Constructs a SettingsTabPageView object with the provided SettingsController.

Starts the chat server and listens for incoming client connections.

subscribe(INotifyValidationChanged) - Method in class Controller.SettingsController
